src:
Brian Ferreira Resmi Ucapkan Perpisahan dengan PSS Sleman
07 Nov 2019, 02:18 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSS Sleman dipastikan berpisah dengan gelandang asingnya asal Argentina, Brian Ferreira, meski kompetisi Shopee Liga 1 2019 belum berakhir.
Pemain berpaspor Irak ini sudah mengucapkan kalimat perpisahan kepada klub dan pendukung PSS Sleman. Hal itu ia lakukan usai laga antara Elang Jawa lawan Bali United di laga pekan ke-27 Shopee Liga 1 2019 di Stadion Maguwoharjo, Sleman, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Pesan singkat diucapkan Brian Ferreira di tengah lapangan, di hadapan belasan ribu suporter PSS Sleman setelah laga yang berkesudahan imbang tanpa gol. Brian harus mengakhiri kompetisi Shopee Liga 1 2019 lebih cepat karena sakit di bagian ulu hatinya.
Brian didiagnosis mengalami robek pada bagian otot perut, setelah mengalami benturan hebat dengan pemain Persija Jakarta, Sandi Sute. Robekan di otot perut bagian dalam dengan ukuran 3,3x1,5 sentimeter, membuatnya harus beristirahat sampai akhir musim.
text:
Brian Ferreira Officially Said Farewell to PSS Sleman
Nov 7 2019, 02:18 by Bola.net
Bola.net - PSS Sleman is certain to part with its foreign Argentine midfielder Brian Ferreira, even though the 2018 Shopee Liga competition has not ended yet.
The Iraqi passport player has said farewell to the club and supporters of PSS Sleman. That he did after the match between the Javanese eagle against Bali United in the 27th week of Shopee Liga 1 match 2019 at Maguwoharjo Stadium, Sleman, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
A short message was delivered by Brian Ferreira in the middle of the field, in the presence of tens of thousands of Sleman PSS supporters after the match which ended in a goalless draw. Brian had to end the Shopee League 1 2019 competition sooner because of pain in his solar plexus.
Brian was diagnosed with a tear in the abdominal muscles, after experiencing a severe collision with the Persija Jakarta player, Sandi Sute. A tear in the inner abdomen with a size of 3.3x1.5 centimeters, making him have to rest until the end of the season.
